__e: All you have to do is use your power for good instead of evil.
I've heard the stories about you and your no-good father, using your money to buy people off.
So, hey, go ahead, use your new pal here to torture me all you want, because every time you do, all it does is remind me how much
So if you have a problem, you use this.
I'm willing to face that, if I can just know Why you're here. Why you've taken our children
Either you've been using Jeff's house to carry on an affair, and that's why we found your print on the key. Or you were in the house trying to kill your partner.
You used my father's death to use me, too
Surely you realize I wont tell you anything, no matter how rough you are.
Try it. Use your eyes to convey that you are serious.
How you allocate your resources is up to you, chief.
How you allocate your resources is up to you, captain.
Your manager said that you drive the boat.
Please use the name my mother intended:
Oh, and use the good dinner set tonight.
So you use a telephone to find a wife?
Sir, it seems you're using a phone that doesn't belong to you.
Jack said to Bob, "You're a fool if you use anybody else besides Robert."
